General.Name: WASGAU Produktions & Handels AG
General.Description: WASGAU Produktions & Handels AG engages in the food business. The company offers bread rolls, breads, cakes, and pastries; meat and sausage products; fruits and vegetables; and wines under the WASGAU brand. It also provides its products through online. The company was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Pirmasens, Germany. WASGAU Produktions & Handels AG is a subsidiary of Wasgau Food Beteiligungsgesellschaft mbH.
